thread.title: Manchester City make Etihad BOMBPROOF: The club have installed anti-shatter glass around the ground over fears of terror attack
thread.title_full: Manchester City make Etihad BOMBPROOF: The club have installed anti-shatter glass around the ground over fears of terror attack

author: wally Downes
title: Manchester City make Etihad BOMBPROOF: The club have installed anti-shatter glass around the ground over fears of terror attack
text:
EFL RED AND BLUE ALERT Manchester City make Etihad BOMBPROOF: The club have installed anti-shatter glass around the ground over fears of terror attack 
Fans of Pep Guardiola's side and visitors to the Etihad will now be protected by an anti-shatter film wrapped around the glass panes at the proud front of the gound by WALLY DOWNES JR
